website_summaries.verdict: Great standing table for a party that is easy to put up and take down.
pros: Good size at 32 inches in diameter
A great way to get extra table top area in a small space
Can seat three adults with higher chairs
Good quality and sturdy – even on carpet
Works well as a stand-up desk
cons: This is a high table and may be too high for some people to stand and work at comfortably

customer_reviews.title: It's Solid BUT -
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid table BUT it weighs a ton. My wife wanted something she could move around and this is not it! The construction is excellent and should last forever - AND you could probably park a truck on it. I wanted a "Portable" table not this monster. If I wanted a bulky solid piece of furniture I would have purchased a regular table. It's labeled "Granite White" but what they really mean is, "it weighs more than a slab of solid Granite".
customer_reviews.author: Frank Costello

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: This product is better than the description. It is very heavy if you pick it up which makes it very sturdy. It is easy to move around the room if you do not pick it up. The table is white but I decoupaged mine for use as a computer combination sewing table and I wanted it to match the color of my other furniture so I used brown material. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Tovar

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this table. It is very sturdy! There is not a bit of wobble to it! The table top has a nicely grained finish ( not padded) so no coasters required. The legs are strong, but the table is easy to fold and put away. This seems to be a a tad bigger than most card tables, which should be handy for working larger format puzzles. We actually bought this for the grandchildren to play board games and use with their computers for Minecraft. No complaints from them. Prime free delivery to my front door was an added bonus. Nice table.
customer_reviews.author: DONNA B.

customer_reviews.title: Love the table but I wish the frame was aluminum
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this table so our friends could gather around it on Saturdays for cards. It is perfect for that. We used to alternate who’s home to play at, but the table is so heavy that we have decided to just continue to have our card games at our home as opposed to karting the table from place to place. Even though it folds in half which does help, it is still so heavy with the metal frame. If the frame had been made of aluminum I think this table would be excellent! I’m sure the price would not have been as reasonable. It’s a big table and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lani Geeting

customer_reviews.title: A new table
customer_reviews.text: I found exactly what I wanted on Amazon. I will use it for my puzzles, overflow for dinners with relatives. I bought this one because of the strength: it doesn't wobble, plus thickness of the top.
customer_reviews.author: K. McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, versatile, easy to clean, useful table
customer_reviews.text: Good size for short term craft projects, puzzles, wrapping presents, card/game night, and portable enough for tailgating, camping, or whatever. It is sturdy and durable, easy to clean, and easy to store. The top is textured, which is irritating to colorists or sketch artists but not a fatal flaw. Lots of uses for this table and it is durable enough to last for many years as long as it is used as it was intended.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer WinchesterTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Very well constructed!
customer_reviews.text: At first impression the plastic had a dense heft to it. The table top and sides were ridged and unbending. The legs are strong and lock into place. There is an unobtrusive bracing bar which when installed makes the whole Assembly very strong and unyielding to weight bearing. When a torquing twist is applied to the table top, it does not yield. When ready for storage the legs click into receiver clips. The bracing bar also clicks into the underside of the table. The table top folds in half forming a crescent for storage. It has a tuck away fabric/plastic grip for easy luggage-like transport. This is a quality product. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Shep the Wiser

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: A very sturdy, well made table. I use it with a cutting mat on top to cut fabric. Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert P.

customer_reviews.title: If I could give no stars then I would.
customer_reviews.text: This is a disgrace. I was supposed to get a white card table and this is what I got. A used table which is not white and it has a burn hole in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & functional extra seating
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for adding extra seating at a dinner party. Two to four people can sit, with food, without feeling crowded, at these tables. The metal legs aren't terribly attractive, so I chose to use floor-length tablecloths. Not sure the picture show it well--I set up two of these round table in addition to my regular rectangular dining table for a buffet dinner. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We throw a lot of parties so we wanted something that was easy to set up and store away but sturdy. This table is a great pub table height and heavy. I was concerned it would be too light weight and tip over but it is not. It is very sturdy. Love it
customer_reviews.author: avid shopper

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This table was heavier than I thought it would be. The top is fine but the legs refused to lock easily. You have to take a hammer when the table is laying flat on its top and knock the legs into place so that they don't collapse on you. I should have realized for 40 some dollars it wasn't worth the money come save your money and buy a decent card table you'll be glad you did
customer_reviews.author: JACKIE GREENFIELD

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a good purchase. The quality of the tables was great!! The price was great!! I ordered this purchase on Saturday and it was delivered on Monday afternoon and just in time for my big 50th birthday party. I'm super excited!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Brown

customer_reviews.title: Restocking fee.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to return as it was not what I needed for a specific area. Seller has a 20% restocking fee and I had to pay to send it back myself. The weight cost of sending along with the restocking fee would put me in the negative.
customer_reviews.author: TerryT

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this table
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this table sucks and I wouldn't buy it. First of all my table came with a big crack on the side of it. Along with that the 2 sides weren't evenly aligned. Also there were some random blotchy spots all over the table. To be honest the table can stand on it's own but the legs aren't the best and can be bent a by a chair or someone forcing it to bend inwards. You can similar size and style tables on this website for less. This product is more expensive than it deserves to be based off the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ashar

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy but a little hard to close
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 94 year old mother to replace her very old puzzle table. The plastic honeycomb construction on this table top makes if extremely sturdy. The whitish color and smoothness of the top makes it great for puzzles. Although it's a little heavier than her old cardboard one she can still carry it....even at 94. The only downside is that it does not close easily. It does not open/close like the older style...one leg at a time. This opens/closes 2 legs at a time. She uses a rubber mallet to hit the locking mechanisms to fold the legs up again. It's not that she's 94....I had trouble getting them to close.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: 32" Bard Top Table
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off buy saying, buy whichever color spandex cover with the table that amazon recommends you won't regret it. These are great, sturdy, portable bar top tables. The table cloths fit perfectly on them. If you are hosting an outside event (i.e. wedding, dinner party, whatever) these tables are great and portable. Exactly as described. Wouldn't hesitate to buy more if I needed them. They're exactly bar height, so if you plan on buying stools with them, make sure you buy the right height to match.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My Needs
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy! I needed a larger workspace for working in beading and polymer clay; this turned out to be perfect for my needs and the only space I have for a table. It arrived undamaged, and no assembly required - the legs just folded down. It's not heavy, either - at about 22lbs, it was easy getting it up to my apartment. I now have such a nice, clean and (working towards!) organized craftspace.
customer_reviews.author: threedogsplusone

customer_reviews.title: This product said very good condition and that was not the case
customer_reviews.text: This product said very good condition and that was not the case. It had a hole in the top and several dents in the side of it.
customer_reviews.author: nem

customer_reviews.title: Great (but small dent)
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the table and that it feels pretty sturdy, yet it’s light enough to not make it too much trouble to bring out. Like other reviews, mine did have a dent on the side, but no hole and it doesn’t impact the functionality at all. Others had much worse dents from what I see in pictures. I contacted Amazon and I was able to get a discount and keep this item because the replacement would’ve taken weeks to get here due to the current COVID situation. Thank you to Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: A. A.

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The table top was warped so much that the legs don't balance correctly on the floor. The leg is actually 1 inch off the floor. The leg folding mechanism works very very hard. I threw out the box before setting it up and I am stuck with a expensive wobbly table.
customer_reviews.author: deadeye

customer_reviews.title: Wrong dimensions.
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this table because I needed the exact measurements it had listed in the specs. They’re all wrong. The listing says 34.2 x 34.2 x 29.5 inches, what it actually is is 33.75 x 33.75 x 29.15.
customer_reviews.author: Maxim V

customer_reviews.title: Just in time
customer_reviews.text: Order these tables for thanksgiving dinner at my house, as a last resort as I was unable to find in any local stores. They arrived in 48 hours; great product, easy to store away after. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cruzan Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Pretty good quality - the legs are ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Pretty good quality - the legs are sturdy metal, but I wouldn't put hundreds of pounds on it, such as a huge cooler full of water. The legs up neatly because they tuck into each other. First shipment came with a smashed/cracked tabletop but we got a replacement in a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Juicykits

customer_reviews.title: Great table, but not a solid round table
customer_reviews.text: This round table is well made, legs fold and lock in easily in up or down positions. Table is light enough for two people to carry it easily up and down stairs. Visually, however, the table did not meet expectations of a solid, uniform surface: It's composed of two 'halves' and the seam is visible and prone to catch cards and crumbs. It would have been a perfect table if table top had been poured in one solid piece. Description of item should clarify that table legs fold, and table top is composed of two halves -but table top does not fold.
customer_reviews.author: Teach1

customer_reviews.title: Not my parents' or grandparents' card table!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this sturdy, folding square table! I was looking for a card table for extra space to fold and organize things, but this is so much better than I could have imagined with a card table. Sturdy is definitely the word for it and great design. Nice folding legs but they were a little hard to lock into place so I had to push into the legs a bit with my shoulder. Folding it back down was much easier and it locks into place. The corners were protected with plastic covers during shipping. Totally worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: buy4myDogsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and good quality. Very lightweight and recommend buying when on sale. We use for parties in our backyard so suggest buying the matching spandex table covers for them as really dresses up your parties and events. The adults at our parties like them and can easily fit 4-7 adults around them with their drinks and some dry snacks. We use two of them in our yard and have been a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Meister

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea For Table - But came slightly damaged
customer_reviews.text: We use these tables to play card games. Bi-folding, so easy to store and set up. We ordered two of them. On both tables, we discovered that there were small cracks at the fold (on the end) with one table top slightly buckled and cracked at the fold on the end. We talked about returning them, but since we use them only once per month, for a card game, we decided to keep them. Just deal with the bump and crack. In all other respects, the tables seem solidly built.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hess

customer_reviews.title: sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table to use as a sweetheart table at my sons wedding. It is the perfect height and size. It is lightweight and easy to carry. It folds nice for storage. I will use it for my patio after the wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Nursemerry

customer_reviews.title: Solid as a Rock
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive folding table. We needed to add some space to our table for a family gathering. After looking at a large number of folding tables on Amazon, I selected this one because it most closely matched the height and width of our existing table. When it arrived, I set it up and was astonished at how sturdy it was. I expect folding tables to be somewhat wobbly, but this one was solid as a rock. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Crafts

customer_reviews.title: great for a shoe box sized apartment
customer_reviews.text: does not wobble, at all - folds easily and can comfortably seat two for a meal. Legs are sturdy even though they look ugly, a table cloth can hide legs. If like me w/out room for a dinning/kitchen table, this table will not disappoint. Super fast delivery, FedEx fast, wow!
customer_reviews.author: Myost Pitts

customer_reviews.title: The perfect size for a crafting/art table
customer_reviews.text: My office isn't very large and I needed some space to do my artwork but I didn't want to take up my valuable floor space with a permanent table. This table is exactly what I needed! It's the perfect size for a crafting/art table that I can put up when I want to work on projects and then fold back up and stick in my closet. The top is smooth and white, it's sturdy and it folds up easy. And it's a simple square; just large enough for me to spread out and work without reaching all the way across the room like those huge rectangular ones. Very, very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pegasene

customer_reviews.title: Mom Approves
customer_reviews.text: Mom needed a smallish, good looking, sturdy table to eat and play cards on in her little room at a retirement place. This got delivered, put up and...SHE LOVES IT. I just checked it out yesterday. It is perfect. It's very solid. Approved! LoL.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen C.

customer_reviews.title: great table
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars except for the damage. The table is great. Really sturdy and perfect size. We had a party and put it at the end of a long folding table and sat three people around it at the end and they had plenty of room. The negative is because it is sturdy, it is heavy. The shipping box is flimsy, therefore easily damaged. I have read other reviews stating the same thing. They should charge $5 more and really beef up the box. I am not returning it because I don't want to hassle with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim R

customer_reviews.title: Good value, Good Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for entertaining during the holidays. First event was a pumpkin carving party- it held up well under all the weight from the pumpkins and movement from everyone carving. We had plenty of space for 9 people, their food, drinks, and pumpkins with extra elbow room. Packaged well with corner reinforcements. Table is pretty sturdy and not too heavy. Definitely easier to set up with two people, but the folding feature is great for storing it. Seats 10 comfortably, but could squeeze in up to 12 people. Very happy with our purchase and the price. Also bought black and white tablecloths to go with it- they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant addition
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two tables and covers. One of the tables had been used before and would not fold up after we set it up for a party. as you can see, these are an elegant addition to any party setting (provided you get one that works). the broken table was immediately replaced and we are very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: HEB boomer

customer_reviews.title: Just What We Wanted When We Wanted It!
customer_reviews.text: The tables arrived early in the shipping window in perfect condition. They fold in half for easy transport, are lightweight and are the perfect size. We use them for a women's group and usually seat 8 women around the table for conversation. I was worried they would be too small, but they aren't.
customer_reviews.author: Karen G.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful utility table.
customer_reviews.text: This folding table serves its purpose as a work bench. When my project is finished I will use the table to put jigsaw puzzles together. This table works fine as a utility table or for playing cards.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased for a party to provide table for drinks, etc., while standing. Was not sure exactly how these would work. Worked great. Just right - easy to unfold/fold, not too heavy, solid surface and just right height. There was a problem with shipping - slight damage from shipping - box did not do the job. Short story: we order two. One was damaged. With Amazon, you cannot return one when two ordered (have to return entire order). Anyway, got two replacements - again one damaged. Returned two. Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tom T

customer_reviews.title: Solid, lightweight, folding & unfolding legs can be tricky
customer_reviews.text: I needed a table for extra guest. This table would be great for kids or adults. It is very sturdy. When unfolding the legs I have to lightly stand on the edge of the other legs and push since they are so tight. When closing I need to tap the underlying arm brace mechanism with a rubber mallet to get it move back into place. The tightness of folding and unfolding the legs keep it sturdy. There are 2 holes that should line up on the leg arm mechanism. I guess this is in case you want to place permanent screws in the brace. A plus is this table fits nicely under a twin bed in my guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a thinner table to us along a wall in our gazebo to hold food and/or drinks when dinning our in the gazebo. - this is sturdy and perfect for our needs - we originally thought we wanted something with a nicer, classier look to it, but quickly decided since it is outside and exposed to the weather this fit the need much better and once it has table cloth draped over it - no one sees it anyway. Would recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Suzyq

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend for the price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and thought we’d try for the price, GREAT choice, arrived well packaged, look great and sturdy for our needs as a training tables... definitely recommend for the price and quality
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Lays flat for transportation and is sturdy when set up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table for a trade show. I needed it to (1) lay flat in the car for transportation, (2) be sturdy at the show and (3) be big enough for my 32” TV. This table worked out perfectly and through amazon’s “frequently bought together” suggestion, I was able to find a black table cloth to fit it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JLF ADVENTURES

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for entertaining! I was looking for something to put outside by the pool when we had parties. People tend to stand around, but there wasn't a place for drinks or food. This table is perfect. Grab a few of them and scatter them around a party. I put one inside too. Your guests will appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleen H.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and broken.
customer_reviews.text: The table came broken. It’s super heavy and very inconvenient to use. I don’t recommend this table or brand at all. I reordered the same table but with lifetime brand and it was so much lighter. Needless to say I kept the lifetime one. I tried ordering this table twice and each time the table came worse then before, then they literally sent me the same table I just sent back. Waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: T. Grado

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy folding table. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy table. Purchased for an assisted living area with limited space. It arrived on time and intact. Grandma can use it for puzzles or other activities or it can fold up when she has guests. Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo Ma

customer_reviews.title: It's PERFECT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with my chairs and was willing to move it from NY to DE.It folded flat and fit in my little car!!!! Now...it sits on my new deck.If I need to use it indoors,it fits perfectly for extra dinner seating.VERY good product!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Ratigan

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: We needed a table for outside that could be used for anything - gardening, card and board games, etc. This table is incredibly sturdy, and made to withstand rain, dirt, wind, etc. Goes well with the Costco folding chairs we have. Just the right size. Highly recommend over basic card tables that are flimsy. Not there are no low support bars preventing you from using 4 chairs around it. But the supports it does have are heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table. Great for Puzzle fanatics!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table for one reason: puzzles. Sheltering in place in 2020 caused many challenges. Puzzles helped & I needed a place to spread out the pieces. Practical size. Sturdy, not flimsy. I can store easily. Not light weight but nothing too hard to manage by myself. Great card table & extra table for entertaining, too. Very happy with purchase. I did my research & Amazon had best price for this quality.
customer_reviews.author: MariaG

customer_reviews.title: Great product, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to place all my seedlings on under a grow light in a narrow nook of my home. It is light weight, easy to open and close, stores easily, and is very sturdy. I wish it came in a counter height or adjustable height option but this will work. Unfortunately the house I'm renting is very old and the floors have terrible slants (we're talking 2 inch drop 18 inches from the wall). I was worried with these type of feet that I wouldn't be able to level it much but it's very sturdy with a bunch of wobble wedges under it. It's easy to clean and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: J. BushTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy and works beautifully for crafting
customer_reviews.text: This table is EXACTLY what i was looking for. It is sturdy and works beautifully for crafting. However, vendor should reconsider shipper. I spend TWO DAYS on the phone and on chat trying to get it delivered. Shipper was supposed to call me, but that call never happened. We came home from dinner and the large packages was on our front porch in full view for anyone to take
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Know what your ordering!
customer_reviews.text: This table is very sturdy with a great table surface. My problem is that it's stand way too tall for bar stool/ under counter seating chairs as you can see from the picture!! It states that it's 3 foot tall, when actually it's stands over 3.7ft (43") tall. I probably should have read the manufacturer's product info more carefully! That's my bad. Anyways, I'm returning the 2 tables I ordered to find something that'll be more suitable for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Puanani Cuico

customer_reviews.title: A mixed product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a baffling product. The top of the table is a rather sturdy plastic, it folds easily as advertised, and is firmly bolted onto the lower workings. What's confusing is that they bolted the quality product ontop with flimsy pot metal legs. The legs bend if you scoot the table at all and they fold up almost spontaneously as the locking mechanism is almost nonexistent. I spent some time with a hammer and screwdriver to make this a useable product. I imagine I will probably have to support the metal with heavy zip ties soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE the SIZE!
customer_reviews.text: The ACTUAL table top is 34" wide (that .25 (1/4") is with the bottom rim protrusion.. Because the corners are rounded (about a 1" radios) means if you have a 34" SQUARE you need to fit perfectly on top FUGGET ABOUT IT! ) there will be overhang. OTHER than this it seem HIGH QUALITY at the price - have not yet set it up - AND I will update this review if there is any additional info (or STARS) to apply.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bell

customer_reviews.title: This table is well-built
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table to replace my 30 x 30 card table to facilitate picture-puzzle building. At 34 x 34 it is much better for 1000-piece puzzles. The table top is 2" higher than my card table which helps me sit up straighter and save my back (somewhat). What I really like is this table is very sturdy. I can lean on it and it won't deflect. The top has a bevelled edged and a slightly roughen surface. I had to return the first table because it had a gouge on the table top - it was returned with no problem and the replacement was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: TomK

customer_reviews.title: Great table but arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This table is really awesome. Extremely sturdy, strong and very well made. I will use this table for my stained glass projects. It is on the heavy side but you're not going to get strong and sturdy if it's lightweight. Unfortunately mine arrived with a puncture in the table top. I don't understand how that could have happened because the top is heavy duty plastic. I wish it had been packaged with a little more protection for the table top. So back it goes for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly V

customer_reviews.title: I use to thought it is too small, but it's not
customer_reviews.text: When I first time know my husband already pay for it I use to be warried about it's size. But right now I already fall in love with the table. Sometimes we cooking Boiled fish and sauerkraut fish at home without big pan, we even could put the whole cookware on the table and with other dishes. I really like this table. It is big enough for our two people. But when our babies grow up older it might be crowded for four people.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great Table, but arrived DAMAGED. Jury is still out on resolution.
customer_reviews.text: I got this table to use for school - we homeschool. I love the size/shape and sturdiness. I was really disappointed that the table arrived dented in two places (one of the dents resulted in a crack in the plastic. I'm hoping I can get a partial refund or replacement... ain't nobody want to deal with shipping something this big back!
customer_reviews.author: Brown-eyed Mama

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This item is very sturdy and folds up easily. I especially like how the legs lock open; no wobbling at all. I use it mostly for playing games, but I had friends over for dinner and we ate at it too. It did arrive with a few small dents on the edges, but Amazon made it right! FYI - If you're ordering it, the box says exactly what it is on the outside so anyone can see what you're getting when it's delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Hart

customer_reviews.title: Portable office in a guest room
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table. It is long and narrow just what I wanted. I can convert my guest room to an office area without taking up much space. It is perfect. The table was far better than I expected. Terrific quality, lightweight but not flimsy at all, very easy to put up and take down. I can see myself using this on my patio in the summer for an extra table while having guests. So pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CourageYouNeed

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fold down
customer_reviews.text: One of the folding leg hinge is jammed/too tight and after forcing it to open I cannot get that leg to fold back down. The hinge is bent/deformed from me trying to push it down. I need it to fold down to store for when it is not in use. I would give it 4 stars if both legs opened and folded down easily. Will buy a table I can test out at the store.
customer_reviews.author: buyer01

customer_reviews.title: Completely Broken!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 tables, and 3 were fine but one had a big hole and bubble on the top of one of them. There is no way I can use it bc someone can set their glass on it and it would fall over it's so bad!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Hickey

customer_reviews.title: less sturdy than expected especially for the price :(
customer_reviews.text: i bought this bc of how it folds (i can place things under it w/o the folding parts getting in the way) plus it's able to handle my 43" tv and desktop, and i could move it all by myself very easily. however! this also seems to mean less sturdiness (and make sure you open the legs out hard in order to lock them in, otherwise will collapse easily). i do love the white top (to match my furniture) but otherwise......i'd consider a different brand!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonHobbyist

customer_reviews.title: I like this table very very much with one complaint
customer_reviews.text: I like this table very very much with one complaint. Pros: perfect size (34" square), very well made, sturdy. This table is perfect in every way.... except... it was extremely difficult to get the legs opened all the way so that the little raised "button" would fit into the little depression on the other half of the angle metal piece. I had to use a hammer to really whack it to make it go into place. I haven't dared try to unfold the legs yet. I am hoping..... that with time.... it will work more easily and smoothly. Other than that, I love this table.... it's top quality and super sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this table selection. I had been looking at outside table for our apartment balcony for months! It needed to be fold-able for easy storage and able to fit our small space. I really like the size and height of this table. It is a little taller that a coffee or side table so you can comfortably eat, drink or play games on it. The top is plastic but looks like wicker woven, so very easy to clean! Price is very fair and comparable, but best option out there for the style and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 tables. Only one table arrived. I called the company, I believe I spoke to Rhonda which was very nice and very helpful. I only had one tracking number there was actually two tracking numbers. The second table arrived later that day. Great customer service. The tables are perfect for what I need them for. Sturdy easy set up and easy to fold down. I will buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim J. Ball

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Wow just wow and not in a good way. This table never arrived. I’m still arguing with MyOfficeInnovations to get a refund the the table that never arrived!!! Totally unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Meggy97531

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at how sturdy it is
customer_reviews.text: It is quite heavy-duty. That makes it a bit heavier to handle that perhaps some of the other tables of the same size, but nice and sturdy for use. Not wobbly. I want it to set up and do hobby work in front of my couch, so it is a bit tall for that, more appropriate height for using a kitchen chair. I will use a pipe cutter and shorten the legs about 5" or so.
customer_reviews.author: Randj

customer_reviews.title: Chances are, it will come broken
customer_reviews.text: This is really not a product you should order from Amazon. I ordered 3, two came in with holes punched through the top. Probably need to look into improving the packaging if it's going to continue to be available on Amazon. So you have a 33% chance of having a good table. So for the one that is usable, it comes with two bars to put across the legs, but they really don't fit. The table gets a couple stars because it does feel sturdy without those bars. Overall do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Great round foldabletable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my jigsaw puzzles. Folds up great and can slide under my bed when not in use. I love the light colored top. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: I can recommend this table
customer_reviews.text: Besides the loose safety latch that easily slides off the hinge of the supporting brace and causes the legs to collapse while attempting to erect the table, this table is quite nice and sturdy once up. It is well worth the money. I particularly like the beveled edge. My friends have some other brand's tables similar to these, but those don't have the nice beveled edge. Theirs also have 'knee knockers', where this design does not.
customer_reviews.author: Charles F.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. I am using these for a wedding ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I am using these for a wedding venue and didn't like the bars on the side. They come completely off, it's a hassle putting up and taking down.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Table is what we expected including damaged
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is. The size is 72" round. But because it is large, heavy and awkward it gets thrown around a lot. Delivery people hate large, heavy, awkward packages. Ours is damaged but I seriously doubt that if we ordered a new one that is would arrive in better condition. The company should wrap the corners of the table (long flat center side) in something to protect them (maybe 2 foam corner pieces) but then the prices would likely go way up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am always at a loss for a sweetheart table at venues as I hate the 4' rectangular
customer_reviews.text: I am an Event Planner, decorator and florist - primarily for weddings. I am always at a loss for a sweetheart table at venues as I hate the 4' rectangular. 30" rounds will work but still on the small side. This table is perfect in my opinion. I have other multiple uses for it as well. Easy to carry and set up - sturdy. Arrived in perfect condition. Yes - I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: katfish

customer_reviews.title: These are AWESOME!  Stores flat - very sturdy... such a good price!
customer_reviews.text: These tables are such a great deal! Very sturdy, and the size is perfect. I was worried they would be tippy, but the weight is good... and the way the legs are designed, the weight is well distributed... I'm tempted to use as a standing desk! Also the fact that they fold up flat is amazing. I have used the other tables with a pole and base, and all the pieces are kind of a nightmare. This is great, because its all attached and folding it up is very easy.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great for 6 to 7 adults
customer_reviews.text: Even though I got this used, this is a very sturdy table that folds in the middle. I used one that was from Lifetime 48", but that one to me was not as stable as this one I picked up from Amazon. The built and quality of this item was super. It's as solid as one that doesn't fold in half and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: chuifam

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties just get a cover for it
customer_reviews.text: This table is good so far.. light enough for me to carry but still sturdy.. I got a black stretchy cover to go over it and it’s really professional looking.. I like that it folds to store in the garage easily and set up for parties.. it’s a good size for 4 people to stand a around comfortably with no crowding at all
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Minor imperfections translates to "do not purchase!"
customer_reviews.text: Description says a few imperfections. This table is cracked all the way around on the edge, and has two additional cracks on the top. Table top was not attached to the legs, all the screws were pulled out of the holes. I had to drill new holes to attach the table top to the legs. I would love to return the table for a refund but there is a deadline Imust meet and there is not a store in town the keeps these things in stick. Very disappointed! Worst purchase I have ever made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Bluhm

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable legs would be great.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that would improve this would be adjustable height legs. This is trim & thin & lightweight. It sits dead against the wall & is very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Dick

customer_reviews.title: The table arrived damaged. The packing is not sufficient ...
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived damaged. The packing is not sufficient to protect the table in transit. The table legs are stabilized by a cross bar that will pop out if you hit with your foot while sitting at the table. Despite this, I kept it. I use a tablecloth and it covers the damage. I tell my family to be careful with the legs. It meets our needs for temporary use, but if I had it to do over again, I would not order it.
customer_reviews.author: MF Anders

customer_reviews.title: Great portable table!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and folds easily. It is textured so be aware, but its VERY durable and transportable and a good size!
customer_reviews.author: Song

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken -Twice
customer_reviews.text: I had to give a bad review because our table came broken. I returned the first one and was provided a second one which arrived broken too. I think it’s too heavy for the packaging. Both times a corner was smashed and broken. I ended up returning the second one and ordering a lighter weight table.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Allen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This table is the perfect size for my pandemic notary porch office. Long enough to accommodate flyers and hand sanitizer without taking away space for clients and documents. Chairs fit underneath nicely so they don't take up more porch space. Only one very minor note: the top is not completely smooth. But it is also not rough enough to make signatures look bumpy. Really happy with this table.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Rybski

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!  Great table, sturdy, easy to clean, no ifs, ands or buts!
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to put together and put away. I don't have a hard time locking the legs like some others. I have it standing on it's side with the legs facing me. I pull one set of legs up, lock it in place, then push the other legs down and lock them in place and stand it right side up. It's not that heavy that I can't flip it up myself. I have it stored in my kitchen so I can easily pull out when I need that extra space to work on.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kolber

customer_reviews.title: Good, but still easily breakable
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but still do not quite hold up to the wear and tear of loading/unloading and setup/teardown on an occasional basis. Quite susceptible to cracks and scratches like most tables of this type. Also these tables have removable cross-supports which we've found to be more annoying than helpful. These tables were the cheapest of this type, but hold up about on par with other tables of similar type. The folding in half is nice for storage and transportation in vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: DMHokie

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about how this item would look upon arrival, I was so happy that it was in good shape. I do suggest wiping it all down with a mild cleaner and towel as it seemed to have a bit of dust or whatever on it from the warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Packaging guarantees damage!
customer_reviews.text: The table itself is nice but the packaging is beyond inadequate and as a result the table is almost guaranteed to be damaged. This is my second table and it has scratches all over it and damage on both ends. Trying to decide if it’s worth sending back again. I am disappointed I haven’t been able to get much help from Amazon on this.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little table!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use mainly as a puzzle table. I can work a 1500 piece puzzle on it. Very sturdy. Easy to move. Haven’t tried to fold it up for storage yet. Initial set up was a bit stiff but that’s to be expected. Will also use for gatherings and such for extra room.
customer_reviews.author: PJTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: I've always used "card tables" in my business as a quick to set up temporary table for employees to use. Over time they have warped and have always been a bit wobbly. This table is SUPER heavy duty and very sturdy! Easy to set up and easily wipes clean. I highly recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: Tess W.

customer_reviews.title: Party tables - standing tall
customer_reviews.text: Note the tables are tall, i’m 5’1”. Anyone using for kids party would have difficulty kids reaching top unless you want to keep them from getting items. However, great for party’s and get togethers for teens and older. lots of room around the table top at least 4-5 people can stand around it comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Dory

customer_reviews.title: Nice Heavy Duty Card Table.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to primarily work puzzles on. The lighter color background helps. It is very sturdy and I have used it for various things. The legs are a bit stiff to fold down but they may loosen up a little with more use. I would definetly recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: Rich from Idaho

customer_reviews.title: solid table but the leg brackets are very hard to lock/unlock
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid table, no wobble. That said, the way you lock the legs in place is very very hard unless you have a lot of hand strength. So folding them up again is not a simple thing. I used a big mallet to pound them into place and would be afraid to use my hands even if I had the strength to push them into place for fear of catching skin in between metal. Otherwise would have been a five star review.
customer_reviews.author: RPCV 2002

customer_reviews.title: Old heavy TV stand
customer_reviews.text: For $50 it's a good table. Knocked a star off because 1 corner was banged up during shipping, and it has noticeable sag when placing my 80 pound old 32" CRT tv on it.
customer_reviews.author: captainkirk

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy strong table! (Highly recommended)!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table! very heavy duty! This table does not wobble like most do. It's because of the dual supports on each leg. Top has heavy duty plastic top. I used this table recently at a music talent show. Had an old Bogen pa amp on it. The amp weights at least 40lbs. + , plus an old 1950's art deco light, effects electronics, ipad, etc. I would highly recommend this table for any dj, musician who wants to put a lot of equipment on it! Has a lot of room!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We use the 18" width table out on our slender patio--works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these tables! The price is right and they can be quickly set up, used, then stowed away. We use the 18" width table out on our slender patio--works great!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Prime Buyer

customer_reviews.title: VERY Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow! This thing is industrial strong. It took some force to get the legs in place, but I could probably keep an elephant on this thing. Wait! This isn't my elephant! Who left an elephant here? ... Okay, I need to go see to this elephant, but anyway, the Flash Furniture 34'' Square Granite White Plastic Folding Table [DAD-YCZ-86-GG] is a very strong table.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Solid table, works better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: The Easter Bunny bought for our son. It’s used as a lego table with LEGO tiles glued down on the surface. Works amazing and gets used obsessively. Heavy duty table that can handle multiple 6 and 7 year olds at a time. Might have to buy another to use during holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Holmden Family

customer_reviews.title: It was broken both times...
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn't see it was broken and used it. Great table. Then, I noticed the crack. I should have inspected it better because the box was broken as well. I returned it. The second table was broken as well. Its probably not the seller's fault. I returned it as well also.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: The table is well made I have no complaints there. My only issue this table is really tall! Taller than most bars! I am 5 foot ten inches tall and the top of the table comes up just below my chest. Anyone shorter than I will need a tall bar stool to sit at it or a step stool to stand and use the table. I use them for crafts.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: This was badly damaged!
customer_reviews.text: Really really disappointed in this! It was the right size for beautiful cake. I ordered weeks ago. When we set up reception venu I could have cried when I took this out of the box! It had been dropped on both ends I guess. Both of them are badly dented!
customer_reviews.author: DebbieintheDraft

product_meta.title: Flash Furniture 2.6-Foot Round Granite White Plastic Bar Height Folding Table
product_meta.description: Color:Granite White| Size:2.6 Foot| Style:Bar HeightWhen you need a little extra surface area this folding bar height table is the perfect choice. This plastic folding table is a convenient option when you need to set up tables for special events, cook-outs on your patio at Home or when you're serving snacks around the pool. Use during events as a mixing bar and pair with table height tables for a touch of elegance. This durable, easy to clean table is commercial rated for use in banquet halls, convention centers and at trade shows. The thick, granite white tabletop is 1.75" thick, and will comfortably seat up to 3 adults. Its waterproof, impact and stain resistant top have a 165 pound static load capacity. Non-Locking bar height gray powder coated cross legs fold to transport and store. Non-marring floor caps protect your floor by sliding smoothly when you need to move it. The 32" Round Granite White Plastic Bar Height Folding Table is a convenient option for your next Home, school or business event. Designed for both indoor and outdoor use, store table indoors and protect the frame from extreme moisture.
feature_bullets: Petite tables add that little extra table top space, and can create a perfect area for crafts, working on projects or entertaining. This 32" round bar height folding table seats up to 3 adults and the legs fold for easy transport and storage.
1.75" thick granite white table top - waterproof, impact and stain resistant top - non-locking bar height gray powder coated cross legs - protective floor caps
Versatile surface option for parties, trade shows, offices, craft rooms and classrooms
PRODUCT MEASUREMENTS >>> Overall Size: 31.25"W x 31.25"D x 43.75"H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,156 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
